ProductInfo.Features:
1280 x 720 (720p HD) Wireless IP Camera With Dedicated Free iPhone/iPad and Android Apps
Built-in SD card DVR expandable to 64Gb & Multi-zone Motion Sensor; Infrared Night Vision to 15 metres
Weatherproof (water and dust proof) to IP67 Rating
Motion Triggered Recordings and Alerts by email and FTP
With a high quality rust proof metal casing, IP67 rating (water and dust proof), long range wireless, infra-red night vision, built-in DVR, motion sensor, email alerts and more, this is a truly all-in-one outdoor HD IP CCTV camera.
ProductInfo.Name: TriVision NC-326W Wi-Fi Wirelss HD 720P Home IP Security Camera Outdoor. Install in 3 Steps with Our Free iPhone, iPad and Android apps. 15m Night Vision, Motion Sensor, SD card DVR expandable to 64Gb, and more
